column4: pentium3, did it already have an OS on it? did you just pop in the HD? cus you can't really do that
I was using this hdd in my Dell latitude running lucid, and just popped it out and into this omnibook (I have done it before with an IBM ThinkPad and an old Dell Inspiron with perfect migration).
also, in /proc/asound/cards it says that it has no sound card yet Win98 ran it perfectly fine.
do you know where I could get them?
